project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the development environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests).
Implement the feature to fetch weather data from a public API.
Parse the fetched weather data to retrieve temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.
Implement the feature to display the weather information in the terminal.
Write tests for each of the features above to ensure functionality.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
